title: The world has yet to realize this transformation- the ultimate JADAM Microbial Pesticide (JMP)

tasks.task: Loading product into a container at parking lot.
subtasks: Approach container at parking lot.
Grasp product with hands.
Lift product into container.
Ensure container is stable.
Repeat for multiple products.

tasks.task: Guiding a combine harvester into desired position.
subtasks: Observe surroundings for clear path.
Approach combine from parking area.
Navigate combine into properly aligned position.
Check for obstacles (e.g., crops, equipment) around.

tasks.task: Adjusting a combine harvester's direction during movement.
subtasks: Identify need to change course.
Steer combine towards new direction.
Monitor combine's position relative to field rows.

tasks.task: Attaching a container to a combine harvester.
subtasks: Identify correct container connector.
Align container with combine's attachment point.
Secure container to combine.
Test attachment for safety.

tasks.task: Unloading product from a combine harvester.
subtasks: Position unloading bin or container under combine's discharge point.
Operate combine's unloading mechanism.
Collect and manage product as it is discharged.

tasks.task: Checking combine harvester's tires for air pressure.
subtasks: Locate tire gauge or pressure check tool.
Inspect each tire's pressure.
Compare measured pressure with recommended level.
Adjust air pressure as necessary using tire inflator.

tasks.task: Inspecting combine harvester's engine for leaks.
subtasks: Locate potential leak sources on engine (e.g., cooling system, oil lines).
Use drip pan or cloth under suspected areas.
Run engine to observe if leaks occur.
Address identified leaks (e.g., tighten connections, replace parts).

tasks.task: Applying fertilizer to fields using a spreader.
subtasks: Load fertilizer into spreader hopper.
Drive tractor with spreader attached over designated areas.
Operate spreader controls to distribute fertilizer evenly.

tasks.task: Calibrating a fertilizer spreader for accuracy.
subtasks: Determine spread area requirements.
Measure spreader's output width.
Check hopper size and adjust based on coverage needed.
Perform test application and evaluate distribution.

tasks.task: Inspecting crop damage during harvesting.
subtasks: Monitor harvested crops for signs of disease or pest infestation.
Note affected areas in the field.
Take samples for further analysis if needed.

tasks.task: Cleaning combine harvester after use.
subtasks: Sort collected crops and debris from the machine.
Wipe down surfaces to remove residue.
Lubricate necessary parts to prevent wear.
Check for any structural damage or maintenance needs.

tasks.task: Using a sledgehammer to clean combine engine.
subtasks: Position access plate near engine for removal.
Remove engine access plate (if necessary).
Use sledgehammer to remove stubborn residue or debris.
Scrub engine components manually after cleaning.

tasks.task: Repairing wiring issues on a combine harvester.
subtasks: Identify faulty electrical connections or damaged wires.
Disconnect battery for safety.
Strip and reconnect wires, or replace faulty components.
Test functionality post-repair to ensure proper operation.

tasks.task: Adjusting machine attachment height for optimal harvesting.
subtasks: Determine appropriate height based on crop type and field conditions.
Raise/lower machine's harvesting platform using controls.
Test height by passing over sample rows.
Make adjustments as necessary for consistent harvesting.

tasks.task: Applying pesticide via a sprayer.
subtasks: Load pesticide into sprayer tank.
Attach sprayer to machine and guide to field edge.
Operate controls to apply pesticide along rows.
Monitor output and coverage during application.

tasks.task: Pruning crops to maintain health and productivity.
subtasks: Assess crops for overgrown areas or diseased parts.
Use pruning shears or saw to remove dead or excess growth.
Dispose of pruned material carefully (e.g., compost).
Apply fungicide or insecticide if needed after pruning.

tasks.task: Checking the depth of planting seeds.
subtasks: Adjust seeder depth settings using controls.
Test seed placement by driving through small test areas.
Calibrate to ensure proper seeding depth for different crops.

tasks.task: Operating a sprayer to distribute liquid fertilizer.
subtasks: Connect sprayer hose to main system.
Assemble nozzle tips on sprayer boom.
Program sprayer settings (e.g., flow rate, pressure) for application.
Drive sprayer along intended routes, monitoring coverage.

tasks.task: Inspecting combine's cutting刀具 for wear.
subtasks: Check blades or sickle condition.
Measure tooth spacing or diameter.
Remove or replace worn components to maintain cutting efficiency.

tasks.task: Jacketing the combine harvester with a protective cover.
subtasks: Remove combine from storage or field.
Unroll protective cover over combine.
Secure edges of cover to prevent wind or water damage.

tasks.task: Removing and replacing a damaged combine head.
subtasks: Identify the damaged head section.
Detach head from combine using appropriate tools.
Transport new head to the combine.
Align and secure new head onto combine.

tasks.task: Preparing the combine harvester for transportation.
subtasks: Remove any attached choppers or additional equipment.
Ensure tires are properly inflated.
Check lighting and signals for road safety.
Secure body of combine to ensure steady transport.
